Package org.apache.commons.math4.genetics

This package provides Genetic Algorithms components and implementations.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CrossoverPolicy
    Policy used to create a pair of new chromosomes by performing a crossover operation on a source pair of chromosomes.
    Fitness
    Fitness of a chromosome.
    MutationPolicy
    Algorithm used to mutate a chromosome.
    PermutationChromosome<T>
    Interface indicating that the chromosome represents a permutation of objects.
    Population
    A collection of chromosomes that facilitates generational evolution.
    SelectionPolicy
    Algorithm used to select a chromosome pair from a population.
    StoppingCondition
    Algorithm used to determine when to stop evolution.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractListChromosome<T>
    Chromosome represented by an immutable list of a fixed length.
    BinaryChromosome
    Chromosome represented by a vector of 0s and 1s.
    BinaryChromosomeTest  
    BinaryMutation
    Mutation for BinaryChromosomes.
    BinaryMutationTest  
    Chromosome
    Individual in a population.
    ChromosomePair
    A pair of Chromosome objects.
    ChromosomeTest  
    CycleCrossover<T>
    Cycle Crossover [CX] builds offspring from ordered chromosomes by identifying cycles between two parent chromosomes.
    CycleCrossoverTest  
    DummyBinaryChromosome
    Implementation of BinaryChromosome for testing purposes
    DummyListChromosome
    Implementation of ListChromosome for testing purposes
    DummyRandomKey
    Implementation of RandomKey for testing purposes
    ElitisticListPopulation
    Population of chromosomes which uses elitism (certain percentage of the best chromosomes is directly copied to the next generation).
    ElitisticListPopulationTest  
    FitnessCachingTest  
    FixedElapsedTime
    Stops after a fixed amount of time has elapsed.
    FixedElapsedTimeTest  
    FixedGenerationCount
    Stops after a fixed number of generations.
    FixedGenerationCountTest  
    GeneticAlgorithm
    Implementation of a genetic algorithm.
    GeneticAlgorithmTestBinary
    This is also an example of usage.
    GeneticAlgorithmTestPermutations
    This is also an example of usage.
    ListPopulation
    Population of chromosomes represented by a List.
    ListPopulationTest  
    NPointCrossover<T>
    N-point crossover policy.
    NPointCrossoverTest  
    OnePointCrossover<T>
    One point crossover policy.
    OnePointCrossoverTest  
    OrderedCrossover<T>
    Order 1 Crossover [OX1] builds offspring from ordered chromosomes by copying a consecutive slice from one parent, and filling up the remaining genes from the other parent as they appear.
    OrderedCrossoverTest  
    RandomKey<T>
    Random Key chromosome is used for permutation representation.
    RandomKeyMutation
    Mutation operator for RandomKeys.
    RandomKeyMutationTest  
    RandomKeyTest  
    TournamentSelection
    Tournament selection scheme.
    TournamentSelectionTest  
    UniformCrossover<T>
    Perform Uniform Crossover [UX] on the specified chromosomes.
    UniformCrossoverTest  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidRepresentationException
    Exception indicating that the representation of a chromosome is not valid.

Package org.apache.commons.math4.genetics Description

This package provides Genetic Algorithms components and implementations.
